sentence: Speaker, I rise today to recognize Colonel Heidi  Dexter, Commander of Space Base Delta 2, Buckley Space Force Base, as  she prepares to move on to her next duty station.

The       American eagle is charged with a coat of arms as a shield,       argent, on a chevron gules between three lions rampant azure,       as many chevronels argent; the crest, out of a coronet or, a       double-tailed lion rampant azure, holding in its dexter paw a       torch or enflamed proper; and ``Integritas'' included as a       motto.
